text: (bangkebangaosa ban niyeay tha) chaur puok eng tralb towkean aupouk robsa puok eng vinh choh haey chaur puok eng brab tha ao lokaupouk robsa puok yeung. pitabrakd nasa kaun( poun yea min) robsa aupouk ban luoch robsa ke haey puok yeung min ach thveusaeaksaei ban laey leukleng te avei del yeung bandoeng haey puok yeung min ach karpar nouv avei del athrkambang ban laey
